019package org.jgrapes.util;
020
021import com.electronwill.nightconfig.core.file.CommentedFileConfig;
022import java.io.File;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
025import org.jgrapes.core.EventPipeline;
026import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
027import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
028import org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialPreferences;
029
030/**
031 * This component provides a store for an application's configuration
032 * backed by a TOML file. 
033 * 
034 * The component reads the initial values from {@link File} passed
035 * to the constructor. During application bootstrap, it 
036 * intercepts the {@link Start} event using a handler with  priority 
037 * 999999. When receiving this event, it fires all known preferences 
038 * values on the channels of the start event as a 
039 * {@link InitialPreferences} event, using a new {@link EventPipeline}
040 * and waiting for its completion. Then, allows the intercepted 
041 * {@link Start} event to continue. 
042 * 
043 * Components that depend on configuration values define handlers
044 * for {@link ConfigurationUpdate} events and adapt themselves to the values 
045 * received. Note that due to the intercepted {@link Start} event, the initial
046 * preferences values are received before the {@link Start} event, so
047 * components' configurations can be rearranged before they actually
048 * start doing something.
049 *
050 * Besides initially publishing the stored preferences values,
051 * the component also listens for {@link ConfigurationUpdate} events
052 * on its channel and updates the TOML file (may be suppressed).
053 */
054@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
055    "PMD.GodClass" })
056public class TomlConfigurationStore extends NightConfigStore {
057
058    /**
059     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given 
060     * channel and the given file.
061     * 
062     * @param componentChannel the channel 
063     * @param file the file used to store the TOML
064     * @throws IOException
065     */
066    public TomlConfigurationStore(Channel componentChannel, File file)
067            throws IOException {
068        this(componentChannel, file, true);
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given 
073     * channel and the given file.
074     * 
075     * @param componentChannel the channel 
076     * @param file the file used to store the TOML
077     * @throws IOException
078     */
079    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
080    public TomlConfigurationStore(Channel componentChannel, File file,
081            boolean update) throws IOException {
082        super(componentChannel, file, update);
083        config = CommentedFileConfig.builder(file).sync().concurrent().build();
084        config.load();
085    }
086
087}
